title: Nice to meet you Geert van Geest, bioinformatics analyst and educator
text:
Nice to meet you Geert van Geest, bioinformatics analyst and educator

Are you looking for collaboration or help in projects related to bioinformatics, breeding or education? Let’s get in touch.

Since 2020 I am working as a bioinformatician at the Interfaculty Bioinformatics Unit in Bern, and as a bioinformatics trainer at the SIB Swiss Institute of Bioinformatics. You might also know me from glittr.org or my involvement in several initiatives related to training at ELIXIR. If it does not interfer with my work at UniBe or SIB, I also pick up projects at a freelance basis.

In addition to my work at UniBe and SIB I helping several companies and institutes with their bioinformatics questions. Of course, they shouldn’t interfere or conflict with my daily work. If you are interested to work with me, we let’s talk! Send me an e-mail at geert@vangeestconsultancy.com
